summary: This mod adds three elemental staffs that can be made at a forge for 300 gold. Each one only does 5 base damage a second...(The default spells do 8 damage a second for comparison.) But it never runs out! It's a good backup weapon for beginner mages who run out of magicka often. The damage will be affected by the relevant perks.

But it never runs out! It's a good backup weapon for beginner mages who run out of magicka often. The damage will be affected by the relevant perks.
author: LunarMagister7
